localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Keyboard-driven commands to navigate your mac apps faster. No more funny breaks visiting dock just to move between apps! Switch's keyboard-centric interface allows for quick navigation between different applications.
blogPost.body: Keyboard-driven commands to navigate your mac apps faster. No more funny breaks visiting dock just to move between apps! Switch's keyboard-centric interface allows for quick navigation between different applications.
blogPost.title: Switch for macOS - Keyboard-driven commands to navigate your mac apps faster.
blogPost.author: Victor Aremu

localize.description: 键盘驱动的命令，以更快地浏览你的Mac应用程序。再也不用为了在应用程序之间移动而去访问dock了! Switch以键盘为中心的界面允许在不同的应用程序之间快速导航。
localize.tagline: 键盘驱动的命令，让你更快地浏览Mac应用。

localize.description: 鍵盤驅動的命令，以更快地瀏覽你的Mac應用程序。再也不用爲了在應用程序之間移動而去訪問dock了! Switch以鍵盤爲中心的界面允許在不同的應用程序之間快速導航。
localize.tagline: 鍵盤驅動的命令，讓你更快地瀏覽Mac應用。

previous.excerpt: With DesignTern we give you a platform to explore a list of Design Internships openings from the biggest companies around the world. You can also use DesignTern to post your own Design Internship opening for your company.
previous.title: DesignTern - Easily Explore & Apply to Design Internships

localize.description: 通过DesignTern，我们为您提供了一个平台，让您探索全球最大公司的设计实习机会列表。你也可以使用DesignTern来发布你自己的公司的设计实习机会。
localize.tagline: 轻松探索和申请设计实习机会

localize.description: 通過DesignTern，我們爲您提供了一個平臺，讓您探索全球最大公司的設計實習機會列表。你也可以使用DesignTern來發布你自己的公司的設計實習機會。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆探索和申請設計實習機會
